Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item boasts a unique blend of quality and functionality that sets it apart from the rest. Given its superior craftsmanship and versatility, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $120 for this product. I look forward to your consideration and hope to bring this remarkable item into your possession soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
